name: Sylvetica
comment:
>>39224835

“There's a lot of rooms,” Nel says, “I think we'll cover more ground in small groups. I'll take the lead, and—“

“What if something goes wrong?” Donnel asks.

“He's right.” Kainzo says. “We've got players offline, so we can afford to take things slowly, at least for now.”

“I wouldn't worry too hard. Rooms like this are usually for loot, and hidden items.” Donnel says.

“Or traps.” Dorian folds his arms. “It's best we stay on guard.”

Paintings line the hallways, like the ones that were in the Cathedral's side rooms. The images are stunning, depicted in unfamiliar clarity, even in comparison to the game world itself. They're pictures of people, and of the surface—and for an instant, you see that woman, who used to occupy the dusty photograph you've stored in your Identifier. Or, are you imagining it? There's a buzzing. Your vision blurs, and your head aches.

“Ashe, are you alright?” Nel asks, looking at you from over his shoulder.

“I'm alright.” You shake your head. “Which room are we going for?”

“We should probably pick one.”

> [[ Continued ]]
